ModMetaData.name: Babies and Children [1.3]
ModMetaData.author: Thirite, Cheran, Jarry1250, lellel, Kori, Zach, cometopapa
ModMetaData.description:
[Babies and Children for 1.3]
Adds babies and children in game.
And Alien children too!!
This mod makes children and babies grow fast.
(caution) There is no pregnancy function in this mod. Use with another mod such as rimjob or CSL.
This is a modified version of the reworked version (Zach) of the forked version (lellel).Updated and modified by cometopapa
